B

BallEvent - Class in events
The ball event corresponds to the movement a group of balls.
BallEvent(long, EventManager, Balls, Point) - Constructor for class events.BallEvent
Initiate the event with a date and the balls on which the event can execute the movement, with a given velocity.
balls - package balls
 
Balls - Class in balls
Vector of Balls represented by Points.
Balls(int, Point, int, int) - Constructor for class balls.Balls
Creates ballNumber balls with random coordinates between maxWidth and maxHeight.
BallsSimulator - Class in balls
Behavior for the simulator of balls.
BallsSimulator() - Constructor for class balls.BallsSimulator
Constructor {gui}.
Boid - Class in boids
Represents a boid that evolves within a 2D boid simulator.
Boid(int, int, Color) - Constructor for class boids.Boid
Constructor of a boid {x, y, fillColor}.
Boid(int, int, Color, double) - Constructor for class boids.Boid
Constructor of a boid, with max speed {x, y, fillColor, maxSpeed}.
BoidEvent - Class in events
Represents an event an a boid group to update the whole group.
BoidEvent(long, BoidSystem, BoidGroup) - Constructor for class events.BoidEvent
Constructor of the event {date, system, flock}.
BoidGroup - Class in boids
Represents a group of boids with its own rules.
BoidGroup(int, int, int, int) - Constructor for class boids.BoidGroup
Constructor of a group of boids.
boids - package boids
 
boids.rules - package boids.rules
 
boids.utils - package boids.utils
 
BoidSystem - Class in boids
Represents a multiagent system where agents are boids.
BoidSystem(int, int) - Constructor for class boids.BoidSystem
Constructor.
BouncingBalls - Class in balls
Vector of bouncing balls.
BouncingBalls(int, Point, int, int) - Constructor for class balls.BouncingBalls
Constructor of bouncing balls.
